The faculties that ascetics and brahmins: The faculty of faith, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
The faculty of energy, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
The faculty of mindfulness, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
The faculty of immersion, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
The faculty of wisdom, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
